00024 #ifndef COLOR_H

00027 #define MAX_COLOR_RESOLUTION 65535
00028 
00029 /*
00030  * Allocates a color in the systems colormap. Either you give the
00031  * RGB values or the name of the color. The name of the color has
00032  * precedence over RGB values.
00033  */
00034 GdkColor *alloc_color(int r, int g, int b, char *colorname);
